title: Shikabane Hime Aka
alternative_title: Corpse Princess: Aka, 屍姫 赫
description: The title “Corpse Princess” belongs to Makina Hoshimura, an undead girl who seeks to hunt down 108 corpses in order to go to heaven.Genres: action, supernatural Themes: girls with guns, Priests and Priestesses, Troublesome Kids
